Pamela Council (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ iji mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, akwa, mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta na nka arụmọrụ
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka ọdịbendị ndị isi ojii America, ma na-egosipụtakarị ọchị. Ọ bi na Bronxville, New York ugbu a.
A mụrụ Pamela Council na 1986 na Southampton, New York; n'ime ezinụlọ Black. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Stuyvesant High School, site na 2000 rụo 2003.

Kansụl gàrà Williams College, site na 2003 ruọ 2007, ébé ọ natara Bachelor of Arts ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Studio Art ma belata na Mathematics. Ọ gàrà Mahadum Columbia, site na 2012 ruo 2014, ébé ọ natara Master of Fine Arts, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ
Ọ bụ ónyé na-enyere onye nkuzi aka n'ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya na Columbia, na-akụzi ma klas ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ na ụlọ 3D.
Kansụl na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ákwà, mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta na nka arụmọrụ

E nyela ọrụ ya ọrụ ma gosipụta ya site na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Studio Museum na Harlem, Williams College Museum of Art, Southampton Historical Museum na Kianga Ellis Projects n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MANA BSMT na 2016, ma sonye na nso nso a na otu, Black Women Artists for Black Lives Matter

A Fountain for Survivors (2021) bụ isi iyi dị mita irí na asatọ n'ime dome ma kpuchie ya ihe karịrị mbọ mkpịsị aka acrylic 350,000. E gosipụtara ọrụ a na Times Square na New York City na 2021 dị ka ụtụ nyé ndị lanarịrị ọrịa COVID-19 na United States.
